price: Ɛberε a wͻhyεε Yεn abufuo no Yɛtuaa wͻn bͻne no so ka, na Yεmaa nsuo faa wͻn nyinaa.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
